email.create_password.expire: This link will expire in 3 hours. To get a new password reset link, visit:
email.create_password.ignore: Ignore this email if you don't want to change your password or didn't request it.
email.create_password.subject: Reset password
email.create_password.text: A password reset link has been requested for your {{appName}} account.
email.email_verification.subject: Verify email
email.email_verification.text: Hi, you are almost ready to start on {{appName}}! Click the link below to verify your email address and get started. The link expires in 2 hours.
email.invite_expires: This link will expire in 7 days.
email.member_invite.subject: Invitation to {{entity}}
email.member_invite.text: You have been invited to {{orgName}} on {{appName}} by {{senderName}}.
email.member_invite.title: You have been invited to join {{orgName}}
email.newsletter.title: You received a newsletter as a member of {{orgName}}
email.system_invite.subject: Invitation
email.system_invite.text: You have been invited to {{appName}} by {{senderName}}.
email.system_invite.title: Join {{appName}}
invalid.color: Color may only contain letters, numbers & starts with #
invalid.domain: Domain must not contain @, no special chars and at least one dot (.) in between.
invalid.min_items: Please add at least {{items_count}} {{item}} to the list.
invalid.min_length_greater_or_eq: Must be greater or equal to {{length}}
invalid.name: Name may only contain letters, numbers, spaces and these characters: ,.'-
invalid.slug: Slug may only contain alphanumeric characters or up to three hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen.
